definition: a broken piece of a brittle artifact, break or cause to break into pieces
details:
noun
- a broken piece of a brittle artifact
= synonyms: shard
- an incomplete piece
= example: an incomplete piece
- a piece broken off or cut off of something else
= example: a piece broken off or cut off of something else
verb
- break or cause to break into pieces
= example: break or cause to break into pieces
= synonyms: break up, fragmentize, fragmentise
